posts.post_content:
Time again to feed my 17 year old's pre-war bug.  He has asked for a Fred Clarke portrait for Christmas.  I am looking for something nice in the 1.5-3 range.  I'll begin combing ebay in the coming days, but wanted to put it on here in the case that there was one available. 

Thanks!

I have one in my ebay store that's probably 1.5ish. I'm also doing a 20% off sale through Cyber Monday for N54 members who buy off ebay.

[URL="http://www.ebay.com/itm/1909-T206-Fred-Clarke-Pittsburgh-Pirates-HOFer-Fair-Piedmont-150-Reverse-/322318780547?ssPageName=STRK:MESE:IT"]here[/URL]

Thanks for the quick reply.  He is going for the T206 Pirates already slabbed - so that is about the condition - maybe a tad north - but I need to make sure I get it for him in a holder.  

Take Care!
